name: Jira
description: Retrieves projects and issues from Jira
introductoryText:
![Jira](data:image/png;base64,)
### Jira Software connector
#### Retrieves projects and issues from the specified user account.

options.name: jiraInstance
options.title: Jira instance
options.description: the name of your Jira instance account on Atlassian, i.e. the subdomain here https://{jiraInstance}.atlassian.net

options.name: projectID
options.title: Retrieve issues for project ID
options.description: if specified, all issues for this project will be retrieved

blockOutputs.label: Issues
blockOutputs.tooltip: the Jira issues for the specified project
